item.title: 3 Effective Ways to Keep You Focused as a Creator
item.description: Away with the Phone! Put your phone away. Far away. Not in your pocket. Not on your desk. In a drawer – away from you. Disconnect. You should be able to tell if you’ve got an emergency call coming in, but past that, aim to be completely oblivious to every other kind of notification flowing into your smart device. If you use a time management technique like Pomodoro (there are plenty of timers and apps in the app store to keep you on track with this strategy), you get 5 minutes every half hour to pause from making awesome stuff.

item.title: Create Sound Clips from iTunes
item.description: Open iTunes. (optional) Import any songs you’d like to make clips for. Select (click) the song that you’d like a sound clip for so that it’s the only one selected. Right-click that song and select “Get Info”. A window will appear – Click “Options” to access the screen to set your start and stop times. Check the boxes next to “Start Time” and “Stop Time”. Enter a start time in the text box next to “Start Time”.
